item.title: Imperial KVN team take comedy crown
item.author: Nickolai Vysokov,
item.description: On Sunday, Imperial College KVN Team “IMPACT” became the UK League Champions, beating 17 other teams from other universities and combined team all over the UK for this title. KVN is a Russian version of University Challenge within standup and sketch comedy. KVN (translates as Club of Funny and …
